name: DocumentType
description: Type of commercial document with business rules and properties

properties.name: code
properties.description: Document type code (QUOTE, ORDER, DELIVERY, INVOICE, CREDIT_NOTE, RECEIPT, etc.)

properties.name: description
properties.description: Detailed description of this document type

properties.name: isAccountingDocument
properties.description: Whether this is an accounting/fiscal document

properties.name: hasLegalValue
properties.description: Whether this document has legal/contractual value

examples.label: Quote / Estimate / Devis
examples.description: Proposal document with no legal value until accepted

examples.label: Purchase Order / Bon de Commande
examples.description: Commitment to purchase, legally binding when accepted

examples.label: Invoice / Facture
examples.description: Accounting and fiscal document requesting payment

examples.label: Credit Note / Avoir
examples.description: Document to cancel or adjust an invoice
